title: Strengthening Data Science Competencies: Community of Inquiry for Online Nursing Practice Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can conduct Community of Inquiry (CoI)-based discussion activities to solve nursing practice problems using online collaboration tools
Learners can design and evaluate online learning activities reflecting the three elements of the CoI framework (social, emotional, cognitive presence)
Learners can propose solutions for complex situations that may occur in actual nursing settings through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
